mapper.select: SELECT cr.id, cr.content, cr.comment_id, cr.comment_reply_id, cr.type, cr.created_at, fu.id AS from_user_id, fu.username AS from_username, fu.nickname AS from_nickname, fu.avatar AS from_avatar, fu.sex AS from_sex, tu.id AS to_user_id, tu.username AS to_username, tu.nickname AS to_nickname, tu.avatar AS to_avatar, tu.sex AS to_sex FROM comment__reply AS cr LEFT JOIN comment AS c ON c.id = cr.comment_id LEFT JOIN user AS fu ON fu.id = cr.from_user_id LEFT JOIN user AS tu ON tu.id = cr.to_user_id WHERE cr.deleted = 0 AND cr.comment_id = #{id} ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC
